full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 210 of 262 1921 LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross 1 A. Yes. 2 Q. Just to be clear, that's just her first name, not her last name; right? 3 A. Correct. 4 Q. So, bottom line is, you don't know, sitting here today, 5 whether Jane was actually on that flight; right? 6 A. I've only flown two persons with that name, and the second 7 person I saw a picture of I met in September of 2003. So it 8 couldn't have been her. 9 Q. All right. But there were potentially lots of people in 10 Epstein's world who had that same first name that you never 11 met; correct? 12 A. Well, there could be. 13 Q. You could have been given the name of Jane's true first 14 name as a passenger and never met that person; correct? 15 A. Say that again. 16 Q. Well, when you're filling out the manifest, you could have 17 been given the names of some of the passengers; right? 18 A. Yes. 19 Q. And you may have been given that first name, that's Jane's 20 true first name; correct? 21 A. Yes. 22 Q. And you might not have met the person on the flight who was 23 actually going by Jane's true first name; correct? 24 A. Possibly. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013488
